top.title: At least four dead as fire engulfs Hong Kong tower blocks
top.summary: Pictures show the flames spreading on bamboo scaffolding on the outside of the high-rise buildings in the Tai Po district.

top.title: Trump defends Witkoff after leak appears to show envoy coaching Russia
top.summary: The US president said he had not heard the audio, but that it sounded like "standard" negotiations.

top.title: No real intent in Moscow to engage in peace talks, says von der Leyen
top.summary: The European Commission chief said the EU would stand with Ukraine and support it "in every way".

top.title: Nvidia plays down Google chip threat concerns
top.summary: The world's most valuable company said it was still "a generation ahead of the industry".

top.title: Ofcom vows to name and shame platforms over online sexism
top.summary: But critics say the regulator's new measures need to be the law rather than guidelines to make the internet safer for women and girls.

top.title: Cryptology firm cancels elections after losing encryption key
top.summary: The International Association for Cryptologic Research - created to study secure communication - said it was an "honest human mistake."

title.#text: First there was nothing, then there was Hoto and Fanttik
Poco partners with Bose to put a subwoofer in its latest phone
Uber’s robotaxi service in UAE now includes fully driverless vehicles
